page.title: 15BAGSHOT PARK
page.content:
Bagshot Park is made up of 360 acres including Home Farm.The house was built in 1875 by{Queen Victoria}as a wedding present for her 3rd son.An extention was built on a few years after for another wedding present.During the years it has been standing many famous people have lived there.Today its used by the{Army {Chaplains}while they're doing their courses.
Inside the house is a fascinating billard room known as the Indian Room. is decorated with sandal wood carved by hand,no two panels are identical.The billard table was also hand carved and is now being stored in London at Messrs.Riley.
